org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.core.tileentity

Class TileMechanicalMachine<RCK,M extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IMachine<M,I,O,P>,I extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IRecipeInput,O extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IRecipeOutput,P extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IRecipeProperties>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity
      • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.CyclopsTileEntity
        • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.InventoryTileEntityBase
          • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.InventoryTileEntity
            • org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.core.tileentity.TileCableConnectableInventory
              • org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.core.tileentity.TileMechanicalMachine<RCK,M,I,O,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    RCK - The recipe cache key type.
    M - The machine type.
    I - The recipe input type.
    O - The recipe output type.
    P - The recipe properties type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory, net.minecraft.inventory.ISidedInventory, net.minecraft.util.ITickable, net.minecraft.world.IWorldNameable, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilitySerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound>, net.minecraftforge.common.util.INBTSerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound>, net.minecraftforge.energy.IEnergyStorage, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.fluid.SingleUseTank.IUpdateListener, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.nbt.INBTProvider, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.CyclopsTileEntity.ITickingTile
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TileMechanicalDryingBasin, TileMechanicalSqueezer

    public abstract class TileMechanicalMachine<RCK,M extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IMachine<M,I,O,P>,I extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IRecipeInput,O extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IRecipeOutput,P extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IRecipeProperties>
extends TileCableConnectableInventory
implements net.minecraftforge.energy.IEnergyStorage, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.fluid.SingleUseTank.IUpdateListener
    An abstract machine base tile entity that is able to process recipes by consuming energy.

      • getRecipeInput

        public abstract I getRecipeInput(net.minecraft.util.NonNullList<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> inputStacks)
        Create a new recipe input holder for the given input stacks. This is used to check which items can be inserted into which slots.
        Parameters:
        inputStacks - The given input stacks. These are not guaranteed to be the stacks that are currently in the inventory.
        Returns:
        A recipe input holder.

      • getRecipeDuration

        Parameters:
        recipe - A recipe.
        Returns:
        The duration of a given recipe.

      • finalizeRecipe

        protected abstract boolean finalizeRecipe(org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api.IRecipe<I,O,P> recipe,
                                          boolean simulate)
        Finalize a recipe. This should insert the recipe output in the machine, and consume the input. If the output could not be added, this method should return false.
        Parameters:
        recipe - A recipe.
        simulate - If finalization should be simulated.
        Returns:
        If finalization was successful.
